channel.title: Bash
channel.description: Your Awesome Website generated by statixite.com! Use the markdown editor to create pages and posts

item.title: Echo to Earth
item.description:
Welcome to your first Statixite Blog post. This post is compiled to pure html, which means no poor server performance and no need for your own database. You can easily host your site with Statixite or export your site files and use as you please. Feel free to use a combination of our toolbar helpers, html, and markdown to get the most out your blogging power. Satixite combines the best ideas of Content Management system with Jekyll, a static website generator.

Hello.. Hello.. Hello.. Is there anybody out there?
